    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="46503" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="46503" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.13</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="521">521</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="90"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>The Uncompromising Sohan</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. <b>The Uncompromising Sohan</b> was launched in 2017. Top notes are Rose, Saffron and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Labdanum and Vetiver; base notes are Laotian Oud and Sandalwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color:                     Redundant offering from Penhaligon's
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>
</pros-cons><div class="cell small-12"><p class="info-note" style="font-size: smaller"><b>Note:</b> The pros and cons listed on this page have been generated using the artificial intelligence system, which analyzes product reviews submitted by our members.     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140066" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Awan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1355337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Awan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355337">Awan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One the best oudy saffron/rose blends out there. Great performance and okay projection.<br />
<br />
This one reminds not at all of Oud Ispahan, which is way more unisex and lighther whereas Sohan is darker and purely masculine.<br />
<br />
One of the best from Penhaligon's.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="2140066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=2140066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007028">Anabol2336</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 08:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is like the male counterpart of the more feminine leaning Byredo Mink. <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2083979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Apotheosis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Apotheosis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782562">Apotheosis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 07:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sohan, reminiscent of Frederik Malle's nocturnal essence (The night), evokes a sense of déjà vu with its ingredient roster bearing striking resemblance. Ostensibly drawing from the illustrious fragrance, Sohan seeks to carve its own identity yet falls prey to the shadows of its muse. Imbued with echoes of the Middle East, its essence is cocooned within Turkish rose, exuding an amalgam of incense and spices that bewitch the senses. However, the allure dissipates upon closer inspection, revealing a lack of distinction. One might be forgiven for mistaking it for its inspiration, for they share a kinship too close for comfort. The exorbitant price tag only serves to exacerbate the disappointment, casting doubt upon the authenticity of its raw materials. In light of these observations, Sohan fails to justify its lofty aspirations and merits a prudent dismissal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="2083979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=2083979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083813" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AkselSvEn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1880438"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AkselSvEn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="2083813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=2083813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041505" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentsyco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/755441"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.755441.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentsyco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/755441">scentsyco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a bottle of this and I dislike it a great deal lol. If anyone is interested in it then message me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="2041505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=2041505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032681" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="koxayous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1303753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="koxayous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303753">koxayous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 11:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i think penhaligons did a great job at creating this roseoud composition.<br />
<br />
delicious opening with luscious red rose and strong saffron. the wood here has a citrusy aspect to it which I like, and the classic roseoud combo is just mouthwatering. <br />
<br />
the base is literally Oud Palao but with a prominent rose. I mean there are small differences but still they are very close. great longevity and projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="2032681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=2032681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023197" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheElf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheElf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Falcon-Leather-59057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Falcon Leather"title="Falcon Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962617">TheElf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 02:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The rose rescues this on my skin. <br />
Penhaligon’s is dangerously teetering on the edge of recycled mediocrity with their oud, spice creations. <br />
If it weren’t for the dry down to sandalwood, mellowed by ever-so-subtle rose, I would have gotten rid of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="2023197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=2023197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995697" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gaharu Cendanapula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350899"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gaharu Cendanapula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Oud-Malaki-17184.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17184.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Malaki"title="Oud Malaki"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995697ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995697" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350899">Gaharu Cendanapula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This very perfume makes the TFOW as misleading by using the word "Oud Wood".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1995697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1995697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987542" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); It smells really masculine for me with this dirty type of musks and dark oudy notes. It’s a classic Oriental combo but made in an elegant British style.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1987542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1987542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953021" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The scent is a 5/10 and this is not a fragrance that I would recommend checking out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1925809"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1925809#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fredward"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1525175.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fredward" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525175">Fredward</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 19:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin it smells straight up like Byredo’s Tobacco mandarin. Opens with this Oud/ rose combo and then dries down to this heavy cumin I get in Byredo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1918298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1918298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1892386" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Definitely.Zella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Definitely.Zella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Midnight-Special-45957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Special"title="Midnight Special"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1892386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1892386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795992">Definitely.Zella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-02">08/02/23 05:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first spray I found it a bit "old lady" - generic and a bit astringent, with a hint of spice underneath. As it developed, though, the warmth and spice came to the forefront, and I found myself really enjoying it. I think most people would consider this a cool weather fragrance, but I love the intensity of the scent at warmer temps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1892386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1892386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1882277" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1882277" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1882277ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1882277" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-19">07/19/23 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Uncompromising Sohan by Penhaligon's<br />
(Unknown date entry record, full review)<br />
<br />
The Uncompromising Sohan can be easily describe as Spicy Rose Oud fragrance.<br />
However, I think the uniqueness in this are the accord that are not too "Ambery"<br />
<br />
The dry down, is beautiful sweet rosy powdery sandalwood with hint of oud and vetiver.<br />
That other of my oud-rose fragrance doesn't have this quality.<br />
<br />
The oud in this, I would say is authentic oud that quite animalic. <br />
And the oud also enhance heavily by spicy property in this, but it make the dry-down<br />
beautiful.<br />
<br />
I highly suggests you to test out a few time before buying the uncompromising sohan.<br />
As this is not user friendly, it is spicy than other rose-oud I tired but it fit the theme as Sohan is Merchant who travel to Egypt and Africa.<br />
<br />
Also, the cap of Sohan is Falcon, which represents Horus (god of Light) in Egypt.<br />
And Falcon also important part of Middle East cluture.<br />
<br />
I think, that is a very well thought-out from Penheligon's<br />
<br />
Score 8/10 <br />
Longevity : 8 hours<br />
Projection : Massive for the first hour, become around 1 arm length for 3-4 hours.<br />
Classification : Leans Masculine<br />
Summary : a Spicy rose-oud fragrance with impressive dry down.<br />
A fragrance to impress in a day time for oud lover.<br />
====<br />
Edit 1 (unknown date):<br />
Comparision to Oud Isaphan (2017)<br />
<br />
I love the fact that this is much softer, wearable one than Oud Isaphan. There is certain sweetness, woody / nutty element that stop fragrance that go beyond usable.<br />
I think it might be coumarin.<br />
<br />
I know, and I can agree that Oud Isaphan 2017 is much better blends with deepness of patchouli. But it just might too earthy almost dirty.<br />
<br />
I appreciate this slightly more as It doesn't have overly strong projection <br />
with certain roundness, easier to use over all.<br />
=====<br />
Revisit note on July 16, 2024<br />
<br />
I retest 5 of my Oud fragrance (More than words, Yasmin, Oud Bouqet, Oud Ambroisie)<br />
At the end of the day, Sohan is still the most spicy with tint-of animallic note.<br />
Cumin like BO at the based, this is most spicy of my archive.<br />
<br />
But, the refinement of This combo, I think - Sohan is one of best case English fragrance<br />
interpretation for ease-of-use, on the day you think you need some slightly daring, exotic.<br />
Sohan still round out the base before going overly dirty, with that powdery woody, tonka amber experience. Classical amber kind of thing. I like Sohan for that.<br />
<br />
Unisex, with masculine leaning quality. After a few wear.<br />
I can see a glimpse being woman using this fragrance.<br />
<br />
But would say, slight too daring for daily use, except strong - bold personality.<br />
Please be careful consider re-test this a few time before commit a full bottle.<br />
8/10<br />
<br />
***<br />
==== Pre blind record ====<br />
(Store test on July 19, 2023 - Skin test, first impression)<br />
Penheligon's sohan<br />
Oud and rose<br />
<br />
When start open with rose beautifully before oud is starting to be more prominent over.<br />
<br />
When we entrying mid note, airy but quite opelque oud taking over everything. However the rose still manage to overcome the scent beautifully. It has sweet undertone that quite syrupy but not overwheming <br />
<br />
What I do like the most is the dry down when sandalwood in little powdery manner try to emerge. I do smell something firey.<br />
<br />
This is strongly reminds me of oud abramad but with beautiful rose aspect and quite fascinating.<br />
<br />
When it reach final dry down, I do notice something difference than other oud fragrance. It is mildly animalic oud is that be real oud?<br />
<br />
Really bidding myself rather I will grab one but this is quite easy to use in reality <br />
<br />
7/10<br />
<br />
Edit 1 : on July 24, 2023<br />
I decided to go with 75 ml.at 180 usd approximate.<br />
After reconsider every point of fragrance, I think this one is the one <br />
I should choose as this is easy to use overall.<br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1882277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1882277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1867631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1867631" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="konchokjenpa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="konchokjenpa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1867631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1867631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302453">konchokjenpa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-29">06/29/23 19:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a verrrry syrupy rose. But the pepper gives it bite. I would swear there's cumin in this though it is not listed, which is giving it that sweaty note. I'm not sure where it would be coming from otherwise. The oud is in the phenolic family or what some call "band aid" oud. Sandalwood is definitely apparent as well. On me, it performs ok for a couple of hours and then vanishes almost completely, like really leaving almost nothing. For the price, as with most from Penhaligon's, it really should do better. I got it at a deep discount, and won't need another bottle if this one ever empties out. It's ok but I won't be reaching for it that often.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1867631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1867631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820841" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820841" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andyjones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1527562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andyjones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820841ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820841" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527562">Andyjones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-29">04/29/23 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have two bottles of Sohan’ one early &amp; one late.<br />
They differ tremendously as the former is very Rose dominant &amp; the latter being more Oud based. I enjoy both of them in equal measure.<br />
I’m not sure if the reason is age &amp; fermentation’ or just a difference in the ingredients used.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1820841"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1820841#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1797290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Yeah, not a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1797290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1797290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1794307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-27">03/27/23 19:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, charming, spicy oud musk 🔥✨️This woody scent is quite alluring but it's a much lighter oud scent, which I feel makes it more of a daytime/afternoon fragrance compared to a nightime with MFK's Oud. I like how bright this perfume is for something with a cinnamon saffron combination. For some reason this is how I think Dev Patel smells like. The wholesome, humble handsome dad who makes you faint with just his English accent and smile. The longevity and sillage are quite moderate, but remember charm whispers😘<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
⬆️Virgo ☀️Taurus 🌜Aries</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1794307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1794307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1760496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1760496" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maliken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maliken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1760496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1760496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503">Maliken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-15">02/15/23 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found most scents from Penhaligon's portaits collection to be exceptionally underwhelming in terms of performance. The Uncompromising Sohan is an absolute beast in that regard. I don't see myself wearing this as I'm generally not too fond of this scent profile, but I can definitely smell that this is some good quality juice and one of the few bottles in the portaits collection I think is worth its asking price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It’s something indeed but luckily on me it lasts about 5 minutes then I’m left with a comforting scent, rose, saffron and a hint if oud, quite soapy but nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1559537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1559537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1552212" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1552212" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Omiyuu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1486849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Omiyuu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1552212ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1552212" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486849">Omiyuu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-27">04/27/22 16:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this scent after a recommendation. I am a big fan of Penhaligon’s, and own several of their Portraits and Trade Route fragrances. <br />
<br />
This fragrance is decent. As with the rest of the Portrait’s, it comes it a very cool bottle. The top-mid notes scent is very woody and there’s a faint bit of rose. On the skin, it develops a cardamom and cinnamon scent. It finally reduces to sandalwood and oud after 7 hours or so. It then lingers on the skin for a few more hours. I found that some of the scent still remained the following day. <br />
<br />
This fragrance is better catered for cooler weathers. It’s strong, spicy and oudy. Definitely more of a masculine scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1552212"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1552212#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1540917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not as loud and crazy as it’s made out to be. Unisex I’d say.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1540917"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1540917#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1519934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1519934" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JazzFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1355391.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JazzFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/4-Montabaco-Intensivo-67775.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67775.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="4. Montabaco Intensivo"title="4. Montabaco Intensivo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1519934ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1519934" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355391">JazzFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-09">03/09/22 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a strong, dominant, mature fragrance. I only wear it in the winter IMO it’s too strong for warmer weather. With that said beautiful scent, but definitely not for everyone and not a compliment getter. It’s a very in your face loud powerful fragrance! Definitely for an older very confident man. Those saying that it’s unisex I can’t disagree more from my entire collection this is the last one I would want to smell on my wife. <br />
Best way for me to describe this: leather jacket, motorcycle, cigar</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1519934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1519934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />

<br />

(Cardamom. They did that with cardamom).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1511105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1511105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1493859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1493859" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rgpick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436962"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1436962.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rgpick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1493859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1493859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436962">Rgpick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-29">01/29/22 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first few minutes hit me with a powerful, dirty kind of rose, no doubt helped by the oud and saffron. It's a thick, syrupy, almost medicinal kind of scent, but in a very good way. The oud is equally strong and smells wonderful to me, not funky or animalic, but just a powerful, slightly smoky wood. This being primarily a rose-oud scent, these absolutely deliver.<br />
<br />
As it begins to dry, that medicinal feel goes away and I get more of the pepper and the rose gets a little sweeter, though still dirty. The vetiver makes itself known, adding a touch of green to the fragrance. Over time, things get just a little more rounded overall and everything calms down after a few hours, while still being very noticeable on you.  <br />
<br />
Longevity, sillage, and projection are huge. You will be in a good sized scent bubble for hours. Definitely need to watch your sprays with this. This is the first rose/oud scent I've tested so I can't compare to others in that style, but this is great in my mind. A unique one for me, one that is not going to be for everyone. I recommend trying/sampling before getting a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1493859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1493859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1490621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1490621" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thanasis_87k"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thanasis_87k" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1490621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1490621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361577">Thanasis_87k</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-25">01/25/22 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only got it on paper sample. I got this and 2 other male portraits. After few moments it had literally eclipsed the other 2 samples. This is a very dominant, male perfume. It has a beastly longevity and is a very invasive perfume. I can only think of someone wearing it to make his presence noticeable. Not an office fragrance unless you're this kind of boss. It is heavy and sweet, like a bitter sweet syrup that remains on the bottom of the pot. I think there is something animalic although not mentioned in the pyramid. For cooler temperatures but I wouldn't mind wearing this day or night. I think one should be brave to wear this in order to support it nevertheless. Be sure to test beforehand, not blind buy it. Portraits are bit expensive but this one, once is your type, it worths every penny.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1490621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1490621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1470023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1470023" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leif"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1213293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leif" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Molton-Brown/Labdanum-Dusk-Eau-de-Parfum-68671.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68671.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Labdanum Dusk Eau de Parfum"title="Labdanum Dusk Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1470023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1470023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213293">Leif</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-25">12/25/21 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me a bit of L’Homme Ideal EdP by Guerlain, minus the almond and cherry sweetness. I think it’s because of the strong incense. But this goes in a more animalic and masculine take, with leather and oud. I also get some balsam and soapy lavender vibes, for some reason. I can see why this fragrance is challenging to some people, but I enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1470023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1470023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1465946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1465946" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gleeeeen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411966"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1411966.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gleeeeen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55442.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heartless Helen"title="Heartless Helen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1465946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1465946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411966">gleeeeen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-18">12/18/21 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is actually no rose or labdanum in this I feel, instead it has a massive hit of incense that later calms down and is accompanied by the sweet oud and saffron. Amazing evening scent with great projection. However, it reacts very differently based on the individual, do give this a spray on your skin before making a decision on the purchase. As a matter of fact, the whole portraits collection is not a blind buy and needs to be tested individually. Overall 10/10 for the longevity, and 9/10 for the silage</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1465946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1465946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
