align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1443044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1443044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1433630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1433630" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IsmailUK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405599"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1405599.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IsmailUK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Uncompromising Sohan"title="The Uncompromising Sohan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1433630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1433630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405599">IsmailUK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-24">10/24/21 02:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is must have rose oud ! <br />
My absolutely favourite 🤩. There are similarities with oud ispahan by dior  , but this is much stronger. <br />
Beast mode longevity and projection. Last 12 + on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1433630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1433630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422178" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-04">10/04/21 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DIRTY SEXY POWER<br />
<br />
This is not for the faint-of-heart.  It makes a statement with not a single moment of hesitancy. No restraints.<br />
<br />
It's for a lion of a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1422178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1422178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Billy Bodega"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397318"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1397318.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Billy Bodega" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397318">Billy Bodega</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-04">10/04/21 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually love this. It's sultry and a bit witchy, but persuasive. The rose is daring — sure of its masculinity, flamboyant, borderline rude. Sean Connery in a silk kimono. The vetiver punches. (I'm convinced when reviewers write "I'm getting leather" but there's no birch tar or cade, they're detecting vetiver combined with other notes?) Soon enough this yields to a lovely, sweet, incensey oud in the drydown. I've been looking for a masculine rose scent since I was around 18, and very slowly manifested this. Word is it's being discontinued, which is a crying shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1422139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1422139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1401766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1401766" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anitanita."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379479"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anitanita." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Coro-Selfridges-Exclusive-55950.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55950.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coro (Selfridges Exclusive)"title="Coro (Selfridges Exclusive)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1401766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1401766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379479">Anitanita.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-31">08/31/21 01:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong to the fullest.On my skin smell so sweet,so I recommend testing this one on skin not paper.<br />
Not your typical compliment getter as not everyone will appreciate this type of scent .Very animalic ,sweaty,sweet and spicy same time.<br />
It projects and last hours.<br />
Not for every occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1401766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1401766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1396194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1396194" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gonu.h"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1376221.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gonu.h" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Le-Lion-Eau-de-Parfum-61036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"title="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1396194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1396194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376221">Gonu.h</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-21">08/21/21 00:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply best of the best. quality men wear this. No more words.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1396194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1396194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1375054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1375054" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="0505413259"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361638"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="0505413259" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1375054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1375054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361638">0505413259</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-13">07/13/21 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>best western made oud i ever. definitely lives up to its name</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1375054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1375054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1367266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1367266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RejdaPersa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1355316.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RejdaPersa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1367266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1367266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355316">RejdaPersa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-28">06/28/21 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first came across this fragrance in the summer of 2018, when I popped into the Canary Wharf boutique to buy a new bottle of Halfeti to replace my existing one. I was with my sister and my friend, and was drawn to The Uncompromising Sohan mainly by the Indian-Iranian name and the appetising colour of its juice.<br />
<br />
I was hooked at first spray. It was powerful, and I remember telling my friend and sister that it smelled like an old Indian attar merchant on a hot day in a way that was right up my street. I offered my wrist to them; my friend recoiled in disgust, and my sister, who was being bewitched by Sohan's sister Yasmine, wrinkled her nose. I remember describing what I was smelling to them on my skin: a deep, plummy amber tempered with a smoky, aromatic note like roasted cumin - softer, slightly less pungent and sweaty than raw cumin, but still unmistakably masculine and brutish.<br />
<br />
At the same time, there was a hot and sticky sweetness balancing the deep aromatic notes, something that smelled very much like an Indian sweetshop to me. It was slightly reminiscent of Tom Ford's Noir Extreme, what with that being based on the Indian ice cream Kulfi, but much more complex and intriguing. This was a Gujarati sweetshop. One that sold freshly deep-fried savoury snacks studded with black pepper and carom seeds, served with fresh green herbs, along with saffron and cardamom laced barfi and jalebi, dripping in rose syrup. All of this within the first few minutes of spraying.<br />
<br />
As the sales associate took my box of Halfeti to the till, I was stood in the middle of the shop seriously contemplating whether to buy The Uncompromising Sohan instead. My friend was dead set against it, holding onto the old man reference, and the salesman offered me a couple of Sohan samples to try in the meanwhile. I reluctantly made my purchase, and we left to grab a drink. The whole time, this gorgeous scent on my wrist just kept developing into something even more beautiful. The polarising opening notes had mellowed on my skin to a deep rosy, ambery oud, always warm, always extremely sexy, and something I could not stop myself from sniffing. Even my friend ended up agreeing that Sohan had settled quite nicely, but both she and my sister still preferred the universally popular Halfeti that I had made one of my signature scents over the past couple of years.<br />
<br />
I continued to regret my decision as Sohan dried down to a still strong, rosy-amber with soft leather and masala incense notes on my skin even after I had had a shower. Luckily, my partner gifted me a bottle of The Uncompromising Sohan the following Valentine's Day, and it continues to be held up there as one of my favourites.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1367266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1367266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1358748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1358748" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SPQRHMS1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350184"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SPQRHMS1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1358748ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1358748" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350184">SPQRHMS1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-12">06/12/21 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powerful &amp; strong, impactful. To me, quite fruity &amp; lively which I love, but turns a little too medicinal (think germolene) which for me is quite distracting. Tested from a 1.5ml sample from Penhaligons</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1358748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1358748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354036" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dr.Banana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346876"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1346876.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dr.Banana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346876">Dr.Banana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-03">06/03/21 16:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OK<br />
<br />
disclaimer I am a noobie and this is my first review.<br />
<br />
So after reading some of the raving reviews I decided to give this bad boy a try and boy oh boy was I surprised. I ordered a small sample and I have to agree big time with Bison blues. Perhaps it was my batch but the initial spray opened with a shocking leather scent with only a hint of the rose. I was very surprised and initially repulsed, going so far as to scrub it off. <br />
<br />
However, I tried it again the following day as the scent had been so shocking and different from what I expected that I wanted to give it another try. I found that it had grown on me considerably. Perhaps the initial spray was somehow tainted by the heat or containment but I am definitely starting to love this. <br />
<br />
Strong. Polarizing. Uncompromising indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1354036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1354036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1340200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1340200" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bison blues"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1194511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bison blues" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Ambre-Nuit-7092.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7092.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Nuit"title="Ambre Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1340200ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1340200" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194511">Bison blues</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-08">05/08/21 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Leather should be a note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1340200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1340200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1335921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1335921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sarinaamani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1130845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sarinaamani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1335921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1335921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845">Sarinaamani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-02">05/02/21 02:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my absolute favourite scent on a man. Not a completely new or groundbreaking composition being the typical rose, oud, saffron and warm spice fragrance but there's strength to this fragrance without punching you in the face (a quiet confidence). Unlike oud Ispahan which is in the same category as this that has a very irritating sharp note that I can't stand, this is more rounded and elegant. Theres almost a sweaty body kind of vibe (dare I say BO) but in a very sexy way. Gives off daddy energy. Love!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1335921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1335921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1334657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1334657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lomama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1317879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lomama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1334657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1334657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317879">Lomama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-29">04/29/21 18:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's a brooding dude on the box art, but this is totally UNISEX to me. I'd wear it. It's just not totally me, but I'd love smelling it on someone else. Tim Curry in vintage 1985 "Clue" was sooo hot!!! I can see him wearing this. Yummy!<br />
<br />
Spicy but sweet. Florals smelled more fruity to me, but I see that note pyramid. It's superbly blended and portioned as all Penhaligon's scents are. Very smooth, very nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1334657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1334657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1332188" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1332188" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spumyland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.189882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spumyland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maher-Olfactive/Santal-Auster-60618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Auster"title="Santal Auster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1332188ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1332188" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882">spumyland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-25">04/25/21 15:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sohan  opens gourmant, with a rose in syrup and saffron reminiscent of a good wine and which smells like a fruit salad with a thousand shades.  <br />
The oud is good, soft, gentle and accompanies the rose that shows its petals only with the whiffs projected in the distance.  Up close she keeps a more seductive aura from shiny red lips.  <br />
She softens slowly darkening and settles on the skin with labdanum, sandalwood, vetiver, smoothly blended into a kind of spicy powder.  <br />
For me a classic but satisfying combo of oud and roses.  <br />
Well done, pleasant and sweet, on the edge of the gourmant, that starts well and ends ... better!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1332188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1332188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1327933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1327933" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellMyCheese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellMyCheese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1327933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1327933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159">SmellMyCheese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-18">04/18/21 19:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A twist on your typical rose-oud with a really smooth sweet saffron and spice mix. In the opening stages it has a really nice fizzy aspect from a good amount of pepper too.<br />
<br />
I compared it side by side with Oud Ispahan and they have similarity, though I’d say Ispahan is more elegant and Sohan is probably the more rich and masculine leaning (feels like a cardamom spice focus vs the floral focus).<br />
<br />
I do wish it projected a touch more but I really like this, definitely bottle worthy. Unisex leaning masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1327933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1327933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1323573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1323573" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="redskyatnight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001627"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001627.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="redskyatnight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Exclusif-30944.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30944.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Exclusif"title="Mon Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1323573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1323573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001627">redskyatnight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-11">04/11/21 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love how this is listed for men, when I find it squarely unisex. In fact, I get a juicy berry note throughout. The Uncompromising Sohan stands in for Midnight Poison for me, which has too much of that generic “blue” men’s cologne feel. Sohan carries the berry, rose, and woodiness but is perfectly dark and decadent. I asked someone’s opinion on it and they said it could be toned down a little...I said, that’s the point. It’s uncompromising. Love it or leave it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1323573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1323573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1310078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1310078" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frejvonfraahsen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frejvonfraahsen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Uncompromising Sohan"title="The Uncompromising Sohan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1310078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1310078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208374">frejvonfraahsen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-18">03/18/21 15:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@Big_Willy_Style Go ahead: you do you! You certainly don't need my permission or approval.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1310078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1310078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1296646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1296646" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1296646ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1296646" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-21">02/21/21 22:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ultimately, The Uncompromising Sohan is a warm, ambery combo of rose and oud. However, it takes a bit of development to get there. TUS opens with a sour-bitter oud note that dominates until the dry down, suppressing all sweetness, and harshing up the spice notes so that they smell more burnt than warm.  <br />
<br />
At this stage, TUS actually reminds me of a less animalic Oud 27, and while I’m intrigued by its unapologetic nature, I find it entirely too acrimonious to actually enjoy.<br />
<br />
However, TUS gets gradually sweeter as it wears. The rose emerges from the burnt harshness of the opening, and eventually the spices do as well, turning from a harsh acrid note into something warm and textural. Gradually, TUS develops an ambery warmth that becomes almost creamy over the course of several hours.<br />
<br />
It’s like the rose and labdanum are a piano and a cello in an oud-and-vetiver death metal band. They’ve been playing along from the beginning, but you can’t hear them until the oud and vetiver chill out a little. By the end, TUS is a classical group with metal influences.  <br />
<br />
TUS is probably the most masculine take on a rose/oud fragrance I’ve smelled, but I still consider it unisex. In fact, it reminds me of Midnight Oud by Juliette Has A Gun. I would absolutely wear this when I wanted to feel like a badass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1296646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1296646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1291752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1291752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1291752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1291752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-12">02/12/21 22:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one.<br />
The more I wear it the more it the more I appreciate it as the most bad ass rose I have smelled. <br />
It opens with a tangy rose and a masterful saffron. <br />
<br />
There's vetiver in the mid and along with slightly animalic cumin. <br />
Sandalwood, musk and oud in the drydown.  <br />
<br />
Will easily last 10 + hours with strong projection and sillage for most of the time. My newest bottle is stronger than my last.<br />
Wife digs it on me and also wears it on occasion.<br />
<br />
Bravo Penhaligon's  🦅<br />
<br />
Scent 8.5/10<br />
Performance 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1291752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1291752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1289196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1289196" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dilettante"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dilettante" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1289196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1289196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246621">dilettante</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-08">02/08/21 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this fragrance. Its light and likeable. Cumin isn't listed in the notes but I get a clear sense of it for at least the first hour or so. Oud is faint. The spices and florals are pleasing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1289196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1289196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1247634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1247634" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s_burr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="s_burr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1247634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1247634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251270">s_burr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-12">11/12/20 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To my nose this is quite a tame oud but that really allows the rose and saffron to stand out with both flowers dancing around the oud from opening until dry down. The saffron in particular steals the show, adding another dynamic element to the often rather simple Rose/Oud combo, bringing a lovely smoothness to the blend; I believe this to be a bit more of a crowd pleaser than your regular oud as a result.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1247634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1247634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1234871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1234871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xabaras"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xabaras" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1234871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1234871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302">xabaras</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-09">10/09/20 17:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an intense fragrance I see very well worn by a self confident man. You need to be strong to wear this. And yet, it has some kind of spicy sweetness which makes it wearable also by a charming femme fatale. I am thinking of Mata Hari and smoky night clubs. These are the thoughts this amazing fragrance inspires. <br />
I would not wear it. I am confident but do not feel the need to mark my territory, and that is the only reason anyone would wear this fragrance: to show who is boss.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1234871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1234871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1227897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1227897" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frejvonfraahsen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frejvonfraahsen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Uncompromising Sohan"title="The Uncompromising Sohan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1227897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1227897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208374">frejvonfraahsen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-23">09/23/20 06:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OH.YES.BABY!<br />
A gorgeous scent for the gentleman/ gentlewoman/ gentlethey/ gentleit /gentle-gender-queer (you get the point).<br />
<br />
Rose, pink pepper, saffron, labdanum and oud comes together in sweet harmony to serve sophisticated, smooth, sweaty,sexy charizzma realness.<br />
<br />
I write sweaty and I MEAN it. This fragrance has a fabulous animalic stink to it! My mind's nose and eye give me visions of unbuttoned silk shirts to reveal hairy chests, sweaty armpits, late-night dancing on a crowded yacht and a whiff of secret bl*w j*bs in the men's bathroom.<br />
<br />
Not for the meek! This smells of filthy rich confidence and "big dick energy" regardless of wearer's gender. Go big or go home ;) <br />
<br />
If you're on a budget you can try Oud Palao by Triptych. It is very similar, with a less "sweaty" but mintier quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1227897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1227897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1220763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
