padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200433">marwaniq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-05">09/05/20 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a person who lives in Dubai, this scent is not special to me.its Frequently refined in local perfume stores and you can get the same scent with same performance for a much cheaper price but i can tell why its hyped in the US. i'm not saying that its bad, its just so normal and ordinary. plus its quite similar to oud ispahan by dior</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1220763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1220763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1220207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1220207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rated_mo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rated_mo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/English-Oak-Redcurrant-46186.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46186.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="English Oak & Redcurrant"title="English Oak & Redcurrant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1220207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1220207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247102">Rated_mo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-04">09/04/20 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sweaty oud but the rose and saffron are exceptional here.. I had oud ispahan, xerjoff more than words and the oud was more offensive there.. If u could get over and love the sweaty vibe in here you will not regret that buy but again its and oud and Rose composition so don't have extremely high hopes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1220207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1220207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1212788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1212788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amateurperfumer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amateurperfumer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1212788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1212788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240985">amateurperfumer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-17">08/17/20 16:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got my sample from Etiket. It opens strongly floral, and gives the impression of a high quality fragrance. The floral notes are not distinctly rose, more like a rose-heavy floral blend. It's quite lovely but I'm afraid this gives the scent a feminine vibe at first. The oud is present but not strong. The vibe is uplifting and bright, like spring sunshine. <br />
<br />
A few minutes later the scent evolves significantly. Now the dominant notes are saffron and floral in roughly equal intensity. Oud is present again in the background. It's still a bit feminine, almost unisex in character. So far I feel like this is a "classy" fragrance. Nothing cheap or synthetic smelling here. It fits with the Penhaligons brand.<br />
<br />
Now the only thing that really matters... the drydown! It becomes more fresh/soapy/powdery and maintains some of its floral character. There's a hint of spiciness poking past the saffron and oud. Once we hit the drydown it leaves the unisex category and it is more obviously masculine. The vibe is no longer like uplifting spring sunshine, it is more balanced and mature. I don't think it would fit for a man under 25 but above 25 this scent says "this guy has got his shit together". You could wear this at the office, at a nice dinner, on a date, day or night, it is very versatile.<br />
<br />
Jeremy Fragrance described this as "smelling like a middle eastern prince." I am from the middle east and I disagree, a middle eastern fragrance would have nose-piercing levels of oud and massive intensity. This fragrance has oud, but it is not oud dominant. I would rate the intensity and performance as average. Sohan feels more like a blend between middle eastern and western perfumery. A nice halfway point. A white person could wear this and smell unique without smelling strange and foreign, nor coming across as an imposter. It is distinctly of higher quality than the designer fragrances of Armani and Paco Rabane (both of whom I love by the way).<br />
<br />
If this was a $120 fragrance I would buy it in a heartbeat simply because it is well made and very different to everything else in my collection. But at current prices I am going to have to pass on it. I definitely do not regret getting the sample though and if you liked my description go ahead and give it a try. If you have lots of money I could see this being a great gift for a father or a husband. I can't see anyone disliking this fragrance at all. I might try to see if I can get a 30ml decant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1212788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1212788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1201896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1201896" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GustaveTheNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GustaveTheNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Gold-Man-918.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.918.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Man"title="Gold Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1201896ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1201896" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015635">GustaveTheNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-20">07/20/20 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An excellent offering from Penhaligons here. The most prominent note here is saffron which is not easy to work with, and there is oud which I was told is real in comparison to the synthetic accord used in halfeti. There is good dose of rose which also smells really nice. <br />
<br />
It immediately reminded me of guerlain oud essentiel which I already own. I dont think its worth having both especially that the latter has very decent performance.<br />
<br />
Projection and longevity are both solid and not overbearing. <br />
<br />
Excellent one from Penhaligons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1201896"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1201896#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1188260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1188260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content=";-)"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/77833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.77833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt=";-)" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/Black-Cashmere-495.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.495.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Cashmere"title="Black Cashmere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1188260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1188260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/77833">;-)</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-14">06/14/20 09:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This isa really nice rose-oud-saffron sent. Good performance, perfectly blended. A True gem.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1188260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1188260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1163766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1163766" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meroo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/472277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.472277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meroo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Tragedy-of-Lord-George-40716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Tragedy of Lord George"title="The Tragedy of Lord George"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1163766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1163766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/472277">meroo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-14">04/14/20 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I layered this with a super e iso scent to 1- increase the performance, 2- brighten the very dark intense oud.<br />
<br />
I sprayed twice on my shirt and once on my wrist. I don't know how long did it last on my skin but I could still get whiffs of it from my shirt after more than 10 hours later!!!<br />
<br />
To me it's beautiful, dark, rugged and dirty. The smell of a classy aloof man. Oud all the way with rose flirting with your nose. For winter and fall, older well dressed men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1163766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1163766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1141186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225390">BrettBrettBrett</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-03">02/03/20 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to say, I am quite shocked no one has mentioned this scents similarity to Nanban by Arquiste. The two are extremely similar, though the rose note on Sohan comes through much more clearly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1141186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1141186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1136255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1136255" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rbalkris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1068449.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rbalkris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Cannibale-31653.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31653.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cannibale"title="Cannibale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1136255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1136255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068449">rbalkris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-20">01/20/20 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A Rose Oud with a twist this is a well blended but still somewhat redundant offering from the house of Penhaligons. The perfume opens with the central rose note surrounded by pink pepper and saffron that stays throughout the length of the perfume. As it begins drying down one notices hints of vetiver and labdanum first, and then sandalwood and Oud.  The masculine leaning perfume has moderate to strong sillage and very good longevity. Not the most novel of perfumes but still a fun wear. Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1136255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1136255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1118056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1118056" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JovanaT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.879193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JovanaT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Couvent-Maison-de-Parfum/Smyrna-53535.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53535.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Smyrna"title="Smyrna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1118056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1118056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879193">JovanaT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-22">11/22/19 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is extremely well crafted scent, and if you haven’t fully explored rose &amp; oud on your frag journey, give this one a go, this is beautiful and it lasts forever. But if you are familiar with this combo  - you can totally skip this one, because there’s nothing particularly unique here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1118056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1118056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1104971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1104971" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dr. Vicius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dr. Vicius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Diaghilev-10109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Diaghilev"title="Diaghilev"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1104971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1104971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208856">Dr. Vicius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-08">10/08/19 13:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Saffron Paradise...<br />
<br />
I know the Oud in here is not the "real thing", but in this case I do not care....<br />
<br />
This is the kind of fragrance that I do like the most. It's laud, bold, in your face, carrying a clear message: "I am here, and I know you have noticed it"<br />
<br />
This to me is leaning more masculine, but not at a classical masculine scent, at all. Saffron here is the king, pair with a big red rose macerated is some kind of liqueur. I can feel also the sexiness here, something close of what you get with Songe d'un Bous d'Ete.... who knows, this could be the contribution of the Laotian Oud listed in the notes breakdown... It is also sweet but not cloying.<br />
<br />
Dry-down is to die for. It settles more gently, not loosing its character, but making it easier to wear, allowing you to endure this aroma for hours to come.<br />
<br />
Uniqueness: medium<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10 (dry-down based)<br />
<br />
Performance: high (huge opening + long dry-down)<br />
<br />
Would I buy it: Yes (already in my collection)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1104971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1104971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1104718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
