padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1074211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy the Frenchy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1165781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy the Frenchy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1074211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1074211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781">Andy the Frenchy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-28">06/28/19 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great oud and rose here, with some vibes of Zegna Indonesian Oud. I prefer the latter by an inch (because of a stronger oud and better performance), but this one is well blended too, and may be slightly more wearable, thus more crowdpleasing compared to Zegna's.<br />
<br />
Fall/Winter, 30+</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1074211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1074211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1057160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1057160" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="polaroidcaesar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1188129.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="polaroidcaesar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Natura/Essencial-Oud-Vanilla-67957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essencial Oud Vanilla"title="Essencial Oud Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1057160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1057160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188129">polaroidcaesar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-04">05/04/19 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunning oud and saffron with vetiver, sandalwood, and spices. Rose is listed in the notes, but I certainly can't smell it very much. This is rugged, muscular, sophisticated and manly af. I like the petroleum comparison that another reviewer noted. It has this leatheriness to it with that cumin flow and oud that is just divine. Of all the Potraits Collection, this and Monsieur Beauregard are my favorites. This would be glorious on a cold night.<br />
<br />
8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1057160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1057160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1028997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1028997" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bbjr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.199261.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bbjr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1028997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1028997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199261">Bbjr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-07">02/07/19 16:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do get the cumin vibe that’s mentioned below but it fades in the first 20 minutes and leaves behind a very refined Oud with amber and sandalwood noticeable in the drydown. Really good stuff!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1028997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1028997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1027497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1027497" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Evan3150"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Evan3150" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1027497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1027497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169631">Evan3150</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-03">02/03/19 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one kills me. I really want to love it but there is a cumin-like note in here that smells like straight b.o. to me. It sucks because everything else is amazing, but I just cant get past it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1027497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1027497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1007483" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1007483" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="picknenders"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/846250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.846250.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="picknenders" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Puredistance/M-V2Q-74481.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74481.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="M V2Q"title="M V2Q"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1007483ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1007483" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/846250">picknenders</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-06">12/06/18 17:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is some really gorgeous stuff. <br />
<br />
First - the bottle - beautiful. Love the theme of royalty and the cap! I mean - yeah, typically I don’t care too much about the presentation, but I’m a sucker for this line. <br />
<br />
Red juice - fitting. <br />
<br />
I echo what many have said - this is definitely an oud and saffron scent. At first spray I felt the rose - and I thought it would stick around, but if goes away quickly. What you’re left with is a spicy - petroleum like mixture. It’s delicious. I think this is overtly masculine - I just can’t imsgine this on a female, but that’s just my opinion. This is high quality stuff - a true gem.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1007483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1007483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent985503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc985503" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CLevol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/126771"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.126771.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CLevol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/Captured-By-Candlelight-41008.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41008.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Captured By Candlelight "title="Captured By Candlelight "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma985503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd985503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/126771">CLevol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-26">09/26/18 11:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very lovely, very unisex!<br />
<br />
This stunning Sohan is the result of a marriage between Brecourt's Farah and Majestic Rose de Yves Saint Laurent.<br />
<br />
It is so funny that in this perfume sweetness and bitterness are playing a nice Hide and seek game; when sweetness appears (a bit like the sweetness of dates) the bitterness will hide.<br />
Very chique</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="985503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=985503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent952910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc952910" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F2097"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F2097" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma952910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd952910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212">F2097</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-16">06/16/18 01:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is another outstanding spice fragrance from Penhaligons. It starts off almost fruity, sticky and sweet. An earthy beeswax, cumin note comes out and then never goes away.<br />
<br />
I think I'd rank this around the middle of the pack for Penhaligons despite this being great. As pleasing as this is Alizarin has more depth, Zizonia is more interesting to start with. <br />
<br />
Spice fragrances I find can be great to start with but tend fade down into a bland one note cupboard spice that sticks around for too long.<br />
<br />
This one stays interesting for a longer than I would have expected and when it does drop down to level where it slowly fades as a single note; I still like it. It goes quite sandy as it completely disappears.<br />
<br />
A lot of perfumes like this you have to be in the mood for, otherwise they are uncomfortable to wear. Sohan is wearable all the time and is one of the most approachable fragrances of its kind.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="952910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=952910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume Beginners"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume Beginners" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ta-if-4922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ta'if"title="Ta'if"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780">Perfume Beginners</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-04">05/04/18 16:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Always love oud and rose composition but I do not like it at first sniff. When it was just sprayed, the oud is too strong for me but wait for some time and its dry down won't let you down. Its dry down is so beautiful and at the largest extent expresses the charm of the composition of rose and oud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="939487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=939487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent931445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc931445" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="itwaswritten718"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1074753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="itwaswritten718" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Emeraude-Agar-39478.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39478.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emeraude Agar"title="Emeraude Agar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma931445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd931445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074753">itwaswritten718</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-10">04/10/18 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does no one else smell the cumin?<br />
<br />
Love fragrance, can't go wrong with lao oud and rose,  but a bit too spicy (gourmand spicy) for my PH.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="931445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=931445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent872779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc872779" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Q80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.698615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Q80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma872779ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd872779" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615">Q80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-21">10/21/17 04:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bitter sweet oud.<br />
<br />
It has that bitterness that accompanies the sweet saffron blend, maybe it's the dates, with some pink pepper, lapdanum, &amp; dirty vetiver.<br />
<br />
It begins quite strong oudi then softens to be bittersweet oud. It reminds me ALLOT of "Sultan Leather" by Merchant Of Venice but lighter and sweeter.<br />
<br />
Very impressive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="872779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=872779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent866856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc866856" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lieu_de_parfum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1088536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lieu_de_parfum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma866856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd866856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1088536">Lieu_de_parfum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-02">10/02/17 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like with many eastern interpretations from this awesome fragrance house, Sohan ticks all the boxes. This opens with a sticky, boozey and resinous like sweetness with undertones of YSL's Splendid Wood spice. The dry down carries the sweetness of Rose and warm Spice. Really nice! <br />
<br />
insta: lieu_de_parfum</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="866856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=866856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent859779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc859779" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tepatrojan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/999923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.999923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tepatrojan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal 33"title="Santal 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma859779ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd859779" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/999923">Tepatrojan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-09">09/09/17 20:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Also, i want to add that i sprayed 3 good sprays into my chest just underneath my t-shirt at around 3pm while shopping at bloomingdales. Its currently 8pm and Im getting a soft creammy rose/oud. I do like very much. Its not a beast. Not strong, but i like getting whiffs of it. Luckily its not strong because my wife hates those skanky rose/oud scents. This on the other hand is soft/light, and kinda creammy. I can totally see myself doing a few extra sprays on the chest, and a few sprays on my arms/hands with a non-scented lotion to make it stick better. And possibly a few sprays of molecule 01 just to enhance it. If i can get this creaminess to project better, then this is without a doubt handsdown a winner and fullbottle worthy!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="859779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=859779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent859736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc859736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tepatrojan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/999923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.999923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tepatrojan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal 33"title="Santal 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma859736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd859736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/999923">Tepatrojan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-09">09/09/17 17:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud and saffron. Reminds me of midnight oud by Juliette has a Gun. Well done. Lighter than others, not over powering, not cloying,..but u will have to be a bit strong on the sprayer if u want it to last beastly. Otherwise good scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="859736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=859736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1367266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1367266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RejdaPersa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1355316.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RejdaPersa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1367266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1367266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355316">RejdaPersa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-28">06/28/21 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first came across this fragrance in the summer of 2018, when I popped into the Canary Wharf boutique to buy a new bottle of Halfeti to replace my existing one. I was with my sister and my friend, and was drawn to The Uncompromising Sohan mainly by the Indian-Iranian name and the appetising colour of its juice.<br />
<br />
I was hooked at first spray. It was powerful, and I remember telling my friend and sister that it smelled like an old Indian attar merchant on a hot day in a way that was right up my street. I offered my wrist to them; my friend recoiled in disgust, and my sister, who was being bewitched by Sohan's sister Yasmine, wrinkled her nose. I remember describing what I was smelling to them on my skin: a deep, plummy amber tempered with a smoky, aromatic note like roasted cumin - softer, slightly less pungent and sweaty than raw cumin, but still unmistakably masculine and brutish.<br />
<br />
At the same time, there was a hot and sticky sweetness balancing the deep aromatic notes, something that smelled very much like an Indian sweetshop to me. It was slightly reminiscent of Tom Ford's Noir Extreme, what with that being based on the Indian ice cream Kulfi, but much more complex and intriguing. This was a Gujarati sweetshop. One that sold freshly deep-fried savoury snacks studded with black pepper and carom seeds, served with fresh green herbs, along with saffron and cardamom laced barfi and jalebi, dripping in rose syrup. All of this within the first few minutes of spraying.<br />
<br />
As the sales associate took my box of Halfeti to the till, I was stood in the middle of the shop seriously contemplating whether to buy The Uncompromising Sohan instead. My friend was dead set against it, holding onto the old man reference, and the salesman offered me a couple of Sohan samples to try in the meanwhile. I reluctantly made my purchase, and we left to grab a drink. The whole time, this gorgeous scent on my wrist just kept developing into something even more beautiful. The polarising opening notes had mellowed on my skin to a deep rosy, ambery oud, always warm, always extremely sexy, and something I could not stop myself from sniffing. Even my friend ended up agreeing that Sohan had settled quite nicely, but both she and my sister still preferred the universally popular Halfeti that I had made one of my signature scents over the past couple of years.<br />
<br />
I continued to regret my decision as Sohan dried down to a still strong, rosy-amber with soft leather and masala incense notes on my skin even after I had had a shower. Luckily, my partner gifted me a bottle of The Uncompromising Sohan the following Valentine's Day, and it continues to be held up there as one of my favourites.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1367266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1367266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1291752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1291752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1291752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1291752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-12">02/12/21 22:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one.<br />
The more I wear it the more it the more I appreciate it as the most bad ass rose I have smelled. <br />
It opens with a tangy rose and a masterful saffron. <br />
<br />
There's vetiver in the mid and along with slightly animalic cumin. <br />
Sandalwood, musk and oud in the drydown.  <br />
<br />
Will easily last 10 + hours with strong projection and sillage for most of the time. My newest bottle is stronger than my last.<br />
Wife digs it on me and also wears it on occasion.<br />
<br />
Bravo Penhaligon's  🦅<br />
<br />
Scent 8.5/10<br />
Performance 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1291752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1291752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1136255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1136255" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rbalkris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1068449.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rbalkris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Cannibale-31653.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31653.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cannibale"title="Cannibale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1136255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1136255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068449">rbalkris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-20">01/20/20 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A Rose Oud with a twist this is a well blended but still somewhat redundant offering from the house of Penhaligons. The perfume opens with the central rose note surrounded by pink pepper and saffron that stays throughout the length of the perfume. As it begins drying down one notices hints of vetiver and labdanum first, and then sandalwood and Oud.  The masculine leaning perfume has moderate to strong sillage and very good longevity. Not the most novel of perfumes but still a fun wear. Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1136255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1136255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1104971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1104971" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dr. Vicius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dr. Vicius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Diaghilev-10109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Diaghilev"title="Diaghilev"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1104971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1104971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208856">Dr. Vicius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-08">10/08/19 13:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Saffron Paradise...<br />
<br />
I know the Oud in here is not the "real thing", but in this case I do not care....<br />
<br />
This is the kind of fragrance that I do like the most. It's laud, bold, in your face, carrying a clear message: "I am here, and I know you have noticed it"<br />
<br />
This to me is leaning more masculine, but not at a classical masculine scent, at all. Saffron here is the king, pair with a big red rose macerated is some kind of liqueur. I can feel also the sexiness here, something close of what you get with Songe d'un Bous d'Ete.... who knows, this could be the contribution of the Laotian Oud listed in the notes breakdown... It is also sweet but not cloying.<br />
<br />
Dry-down is to die for. It settles more gently, not loosing its character, but making it easier to wear, allowing you to endure this aroma for hours to come.<br />
<br />
Uniqueness: medium<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10 (dry-down based)<br />
<br />
Performance: high (huge opening + long dry-down)<br />
<br />
Would I buy it: Yes (already in my collection)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1104971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1104971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422178" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-04">10/04/21 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DIRTY SEXY POWER<br />
<br />
This is not for the faint-of-heart.  It makes a statement with not a single moment of hesitancy. No restraints.<br />
<br />
It's for a lion of a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46503"comment_id="1422178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Uncompromising-Sohan-46503.html?ccid=1422178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46503" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Lattafa-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    </div>

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">4.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">5.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Guerlain.html" class="en2inter">Guerlain</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">53.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Azzaro.html" class="en2inter">Azzaro</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">54.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Narciso-Rodriguez.html" class="en2inter">Narciso Rodriguez</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">55.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Frederic-Malle.html" class="en2inter">Frederic Malle</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">56.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montblanc.html" class="en2inter">Montblanc</a>
        </span>
    </div>

    <script>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
